entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Can only be made into Light/Medium armor. You gain a +3 to both saving throws against the {@condition Charmed} condition and {@skill Intimidation} checks.
Weapon Effects: Can only be made into Piercing/Slashing weapons. All additional damage dealt by this weapon when you hit with it is converted into its weapon's damage type.
Additional Effects: Fey skin burns when touching Blight.
